tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE player_progress ( player_id INT PRIMARY KEY, game_name TEXT, progress_percentage FLOAT );
CREATE TABLE player_info ( player_id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_name TEXT, email TEXT );
CREATE TABLE game_info ( game_id INT PRIMARY KEY, game_name TEXT, release_year INT );

CREATE TABLE player_progress (
    player_id UUID,
    game_name VARCHAR,
    progress INT,
    last_update TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id, game_name)
);

CREATE TABLE progress_log (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID,
    game_id UUID,
    progress INT,
    log_time TIMESTAMP
);
